articles.author: Kayla Clarke, Associated Press
articles.title: The Supreme Court struck down Biden's student debt relief plan. What's next? - WDIV ClickOnDetroit
articles.description: The Supreme Court struck down Biden’s plan to cancel or reduce federal student loan debt for millions of Americans.
articles.content:
The Supreme Court struck down Bidens plan to cancel or reduce federal student loan debt for millions of Americans.
The student loan forgiveness program would have eliminated $10,000 in debt for peop… [+7032 chars]
